basics.name: Monalisa Whalin
basics.headline: AI Product Leader | Builder of intelligent products and durable teams
basics.summary: Product executive focused on AI-native platforms, human-in-the-loop systems, and responsible automation. I partner with engineering and design to ship products that create measurable customer and business impact.

bullets: Scaled an AI operations suite from 0 to $14M ARR across enterprise customers.
Led a 28-person cross-functional org spanning product, design, and PMM.
Reduced model incident response time by 42% via observability workflows.
Launched experimentation framework increasing feature adoption by 31%.
Built strategic roadmap process linking quarterly goals to customer outcomes.
Partnered with sales on enterprise packaging and pricing strategy.
Owned core analytics product used by 120k monthly active users.
Introduced voice-of-customer program that improved NPS by 17 points.
Mentored early-career PMs and established product craftsmanship standards.

projects.name: ModelOps Command Center
projects.description: Operational cockpit for monitoring, rollback, and compliance workflows across LLM applications.
highlights: Reduced false positive incident alerts by 58%.
Introduced policy templates for SOC2 and HIPAA environments.

projects.name: Prompt QA Pipeline
projects.description: Evaluation harness for prompt versioning, scoring, and regression tracking.
highlights: Cut release risk through automated quality gates.
Enabled non-technical teams to review model behavior changes.

projects.name: Signal Mentor
projects.description: AI coaching assistant for managers running 1:1s and career planning conversations.
highlights: Piloted with 40 managers; 87% reported improved conversation quality.
Designed privacy-forward architecture with local-first note encryption.

awards_or_speaking: Speaker, ProductCon: Designing Human-Centered AI Teams (2024)
Guest lecturer on AI product ethics at UT Austin
